name: ForgottenBall
description:
"..An absorbing game with lovely music." - Retrogamer magazine.

In this modern adaptation of an abstract platform adventure puzzler, you will take control of Ball to overcome challenges and ascend a towering labyrinth.

Forgotten Ball is a place where dizzying minimalist architecture will absorb you into a world of stimulation and frustration. Avoid the red primitives and steep declines as you help Ball navigate the giant structure for an end that is unknown.

Inspired by the classics of the 80's and 90s, Forgotten Ball is not just your ordinary 2D platformer. At the corner of a play area, the game rotates by 90 degrees to allow movement on either the X or Z axis.

Forgotten Ball is an enjoyable but challenging experience, some areas are easy…some not so. Just make sure you don't go the wrong way. You can also unlock over 24 ball surfaces in the game and 2 additional hidden abilities.
